attributes.action: Law To Ban Political Parties Using 'Whips' In The House Of Commons
attributes.additional_details:
We have seen how political parties leaders are stopping our elected representatives in parliament from voting by their choice. This is an anti-democratic way of running an elective assembly, all m.p.'s must have a free vote.

A law should be passed to outlaw 'whipping' in the House Of Commons.

rejection.details: Whipping is a matter for political parties and not HM Government.
